analyzed: na vipāka ādi

original: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā (paṭisandhi natthi) … najhānapaccayā …pe… pañcaviññāṇasahagataṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ …pe….

analyzed: ajjhatta ārammaṇam ekam khandham paṭicca tayaḥ khandhāḥ pe

original: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati …pe…
analyzed: vipassati assādeti abhinandati tam ārabbha ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ rāgaḥ uppajjati pe

original: domanassaṁ uppajjati. Ajjhattārammaṇā ajjhattā khandhā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
analyzed: domanassam uppajjati ajjhatta ārammaṇāḥ ajjhattā khandhāḥ pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇassa

original: yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: yathā kammūpaga ñāṇassa anāgata sañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— bahiddhā
analyzed: ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ bahiddha ārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ bahiddhā

original: viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati. Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: viññāṇañca āyatanam paccavekkhati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam paccavekkhati ajjhatta ārammaṇa

original: bahiddhā dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ …pe… iddhividhañāṇaṁ …pe…
analyzed: bahiddhā dibbam cakkhum paccavekkhati dibbam sotadhātum pe iddhividha ñāṇam pe

original: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ …pe… yathākammūpagañāṇaṁ …pe… anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ paccavekkhati,
analyzed: pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇam pe yathā kammūpaga ñāṇam pe anāgata sañāṇam paccavekkhati

original: ajjhattārammaṇe bahiddhā khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati …pe… cetopariyañāṇena
analyzed: ajjhatta ārammaṇe bahiddhā khandhe aniccataḥ dukkhataḥ anattataḥ vipassati pe cetas pariyañāṇena

original: ajjhattārammaṇabahiddhācittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, ajjhattārammaṇā bahiddhā khandhā
analyzed: ajjhatta ārammaṇa bahiddhā citta samaṅgissa cittam jānāti ajjhatta ārammaṇāḥ bahiddhā khandhāḥ

original: cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa,
analyzed: cetas upariya ñāṇassa pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇassa yathā kammūpaga ñāṇassa anāgata sañāṇassa

original: āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: āvajjanāya ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— bahiddhārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ bahiddhā ārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ bahiddhā ārammaṇa

original: bahiddhā dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ paccavekkhati. Iddhividhañāṇaṁ
analyzed: bahiddhā dibbam cakkhum paccavekkhati dibbam sota dhātum paccavekkhati iddhividha ñāṇa

original: …pe… cetopariyañāṇaṁ …pe… pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ …pe… yathākammūpagañāṇaṁ …pe… anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ
analyzed: pe cetas upariya ñāṇam pe pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇam pe yathā kammūpaga ñāṇam pe anāgata sañāṇa

original: paccavekkhati. Bahiddhārammaṇe bahiddhā khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati
analyzed: paccavekkhati bahiddhā ārammaṇe bahiddhā khandhe aniccataḥ dukkhataḥ anattataḥ vipassati

original: …pe… cetopariyañāṇena bahiddhārammaṇabahiddhācittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti. Bahiddhārammaṇā
analyzed: pe cetas upariya ñāṇena bahiddha ārammaṇa bahiddhā citta samaṅgissa cittam jānāti bahiddha ārammaṇā

original: bahiddhā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa,
analyzed: bahiddhā khandhā cetas upariya ñāṇassa pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇassa yathā kammūpaga ñāṇassa

original: anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: anāgata sañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo

original: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dānaṁ
analyzed: bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ ajjhatta ārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ dāna

original: datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati,
analyzed: datvā sīlam samādiyitvā uposatha kammam katvā tam paccavekkhati pubbe su ciṇṇāni paccavekkhati

original: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
analyzed: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānam paccavekkhati ariyāḥ maggāḥ vuṭṭhahitvā maggam paccavekkhanti

original: phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, bahiddhārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite
analyzed: phalam paccavekkhanti bahiddhā ārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti vikkhambhite

original: kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti. Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ajjhattaṁ
analyzed: kilese paccavekkhanti pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti bahiddha ārammaṇam ajjhatta

original: dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ … iddhividhañāṇaṁ … cetopariyañāṇaṁ
analyzed: dibbam cakkhum paccavekkhati dibbam sotadhātum iddhividha ñāṇam cetas pariya ñāṇa

original: … pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ … yathākammūpagañāṇaṁ … anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ … bahiddhārammaṇe
analyzed: pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇam yathā kammūpaga ñāṇam anāgata sañāṇam bahiddhā ārammaṇe

original: ajjhatte khandhe aniccato …pe… vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha ajjhattārammaṇo
analyzed: ajjhatte khandhe aniccato pe vipassati assādeti abhinandati tam ārabbha ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ

original: rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Bahiddhārammaṇā ajjhattā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa,
analyzed: rāgaḥ uppajjati pe domanassam uppajjati bahiddha ārammaṇāḥ ajjhattāḥ khandhāḥ iddhividha ñāṇassa

original: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇassa yathākammūpaga ñāṇassa anāgata sañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Adhipati
analyzed: adhipati

original: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
analyzed: ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ ajjhatta ārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇa adhipati

original: sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—ajjhattaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati,
analyzed: sahajāta adhipati ārammaṇa adhipati ajjhattam viññāṇam ca āyatanam garum katvā paccavekkhati

original: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati. Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ajjhattaṁ dibbaṁ
analyzed: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam garum katvā paccavekkhati ajjhatta ārammaṇam ajjhattam dibba

original: cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā …pe… dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ …pe… iddhividhañāṇaṁ … pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ
analyzed: cakkhum garum katvā pe dibbam sotadhātum pe iddhividha ñāṇam pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇa

original: … yathākammūpagañāṇaṁ … anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ garuṁ katvā …pe… ajjhattārammaṇe ajjhatte
analyzed: yathā kammūpaga ñāṇam anāgata sañāṇam garum katvā pe ajjhatta ārammaṇe ajjhatte

original: khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati,
analyzed: khandhe garum katvā assādeti abhinandati tam garum katvā ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ rāgaḥ uppajjati

original: diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati—ajjhattārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ
analyzed: diṭṭhi uppajjati sahajāta adhipati ajjhatta ārammaṇa adhipati sampayuttakānam khandhānam

original: adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Sahajātādhipati—bahiddhārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ bahiddhā ārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ sahajāta adhipati bahiddhā ārammaṇa ādhipati sampayuttakānam khandhānam adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ

analyzed: datvā sīlam samādiyitvā uposatha kammam katvā tam garum katvā paccavekkhati pubbe

original: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ bahiddhā ārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ sahajāta paccayena paccayaḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ kamma paccayena paccayaḥ
